title: Being matched with New Players
body: I'm level 70 nearly and i'm silver 2 with ok stats, i don't play ranked much and prefer to chill out in normals games, but when i get a level 18 aatrox support who has no idea how to play the game that's half an hour that nobody in the game can get back. i get that new players have to learn but instead of bringing the 18 to the silver-gold game bring the unranked lv 72 he is duo with the the level 18 game please...

replies.body: That's why people say 'Duo' as an insult, because one of those people are being carried
